charityData.name: Macmillan Cancer Support
charityData.description: We’re here to help everyone with cancer live life as fully as they can, providing physical, financial and emotional support. So whatever cancer throws your way, we’re right there with you.
charityData.thankyouMessage:
Thanks so much for your donation to Macmillan Cancer Support. Your support means an incredible amount to us.

We’re here to help everyone with cancer live life as fully as they can, providing physical, financial and emotional support. So whatever cancer throws your way, we’re right there with you. For information, support or just someone to talk to, call 0808 808 00 00 or visit macmillan.org.uk

donationDisplayAmounts.description: Can help answer questions on cancer and give support through our helpline
Can fund an hour on our support line, giving vital information and support
Can help provide counselling to someone dealing with the impact of cancer
Can ensure a Macmillan Nurse is there when someone is diagnosed with cancer
Can help to provide the one to one medical care which matters so much
Can provide benefit advice so people with cancer get the best deal possible

charityData.impactStatementWhat: give you the support you need
charityData.impactStatementWhy: live life as fully as you can

donations.message: Keep up the great help and support you give all of us patients
Such worthy cause, a service that many people will need in their lifetime. Having been blessed with their care on more than one occasion, I know what a brilliant comfort the service offers
I’m donating on behalf of my fantastic singing partner and friend Maria Barratt whom I love dearly and is raising funds for this fantastic charity Macmillan.
